title: Darkstream: the tears will flow
author: VD
content_html:
I’ll be doing one at 12:40 PM EST today, discussing the sob stories and rhetoric that are going to be unleashed at the God-Emperor in light of the new reality.

UPDATE: You can watch the replay here.
